title: PUBG unit sales worldwide 2018
summary: How many people play fortnite ? Having burst onto the scene in 2017 , fortnite has since become a worldwide phenomenon , amassing almost 250 million players across the globe as of 2019 . How did fortnite become so big ? The reasons why fortnite has become such a global hit are clear to see . Not only is the game free , but it is also available on most gaming platforms .
